import React, { useState, FormEvent } from 'react' import { FiChevronRight} from 'react-icons/fi' import api from '../../services/api' import logoImg from '../../assets/logo.svg' import { Title, Form, Repositories} from './styles' const Dashboard: React.FC = () => { const [newRepo, setNewRepo] = useState('') const [repositories, setRepositories] = useState([]) async function handleAddRepository(event: FormEvent, ):Promise { event.preventDefault() const response = await api.get(`repos/${newRepo}`) setRepositories() } return ( <> Explore repositorios no Github
setNewRepo(e.target.value)} placeholder="Digite o nome do repositorio" />
